title: France panorama. [No. 70/39]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The international scene - the Franco-Soviet “Grand Commission” meets in Paris; OECD Colloquy in Nice. 2. 82 years young - Maurice Chevalier celebrates his 82nd birthday. 3. Thoroughbreds - breeding race horses. 4. Poetry for all - accent on poetry in a Paris book-store; applying modern methods in a Lille bookshop. 5. Surfboard lifeguards - On France’s Atlantic seaboard, a new vocation for surf-riding.
